spells.html_content:
Spells

Portal
/ Flexible Portal
1 - 4 Range / 1AP

Places a portal.

When several portals are active, you can use them to teleport or to project spells.
Portals increase projected spells' damage and healing.

Enemies (excluding summons) cannot go through a portal on the first turn.
Required level: :
1|66|132

Normal effects

Places a portal (+15% damage, +2% damage per cell of distance between 2 portals) (infinite)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

spells.html_content:
Spells

Distortion
/ Stupor
1 - 3 Range / 3AP

Summons a Totem that heals allies (excluding summons) that go through portals.
When attacked by an ally, it places and activates a portal on its attacker's cell.

There can only be one Eliotrope Totem per team. If the Totem is still on the field when summoned again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.

The damage increase on the next attack cannot be unbewitched.
